content: in 2022 a predivorce agreement was made between two parties the agreement was notarized by a notary named sledge the document outlines the progress of a divorce case between mr and mrs names omitted the parties have declared their intention to divorce by mutual consent and have made preliminary declarations regarding their marriage children and property they have agreed on various arrangements including coparenting residence and child support the document also addresses issues related to domicile family allowances taxation and the division of assets and debts the parties have granted power of attorney to the notary and made declarations regarding future actions and responsibilities the document concludes with statements regarding succession rules concealments and the granting of a power of attorney the notary confirms the parties identities and their authority to sign the document the parties acknowledge any conflicts of interest and have received a draft of the document at least five days prior they have paid a fee to the notary and are satisfied with the electronic copy the notary has explained the contents of the document and the parties have signed it
